float32.tooltip: how dark is the dark side of a shaded decorator

float32.name: Shaded Bright
float32.tooltip: the bright side of a shaded decorator is this much brighter than the dark side

float32.name: Start Fade
float32.tooltip: decorators will start to fade at this distance

float32.name: End Fade
float32.tooltip: decorators will fade completely and be culled at this distance

float32.name: Early Cull
float32.tooltip: cull vertices this percentage sooner than end fade

float32.name: Cull Block Size
float32.tooltip: decorators are grouped into blocks to be culled in large batches, this determines how much ground each batch covers. Should be small if you expect to have very dense decorators, and large if you expect them to be sparse
